SELECT A.CD_ID ,A.CD_MEANING, A.EXT1 , B.RESERVE_INFO_ID , B.USER_NAME , B.USER_TEL1 , B.USER_EMAIL , B.ACCONT_NO , DATE_FORMAT(B.RESERVE_DATE, '%y/%m/%d') RESERVE_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(B.CREATION_TIMESTAMP, '%y/%m/%d %p %h %i') CREATION_TIMESTAMP , B.MEMO , B.CAR_NUM , B.LOGIN_ID , B.RESERVE_STATE , (SELECT CD_MEANING FROM comm_info WHERE CD_GROUP_ID='RESERVE_STATE' AND CD_ID=B.RESERVE_STATE) AS RESERVE_STATE_NAME , B.ROOM_NUM , B.GROUP_KEY , FORMAT(B.TOTAL_PAY, 0) as TOTAL_PAY , B.PRICE_DESC
FROM comm_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN reserve_info B ON A.CD_ID =B.ROOM_NUM AND B.RESERVE_DATE between ? and ? AND B.LOGIN_ID=? WHERE A.CD_GROUP_ID='ROOM_NUM' AND A.LOGIN_ID=?
queryMap.list_sql2: SELECT A.CD_ID ,A.CD_MEANING , B.RESERVE_INFO_ID , B.USER_NAME , B.USER_TEL1 , B.USER_EMAIL , B.ACCONT_NO , B.RESERVE_DATE , B.MEMO , B.CAR_NUM , B.LOGIN_ID , B.RESERVE_STATE , (SELECT CD_MEANING FROM comm_info WHERE CD_GROUP_ID='RESERVE_STATE' AND CD_ID=B.RESERVE_STATE) AS RESERVE_STATE_NAME , B.ROOM_NUM , B.GROUP_KEY , B.LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP , B.PRICE_DESC FROM ( select CD_ID, CD_MEANING from comm_info where CD_GROUP_ID='ROOM_NUM' AND LOGIN_ID=? ) A INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM reserve_info FORCE INDEX (idx_reserve_info_RESERVE_DATE) WHERE RESERVE_DATE between DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -10 DAY) and DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 DAY) AND LOGIN_ID=? AND RESERVE_STATE='1' and DATEDIFF( now(), LAST_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP) between 2 and 3 ) B ON A.CD_ID =B.ROOM_NUM
queryMap.update_sql: UPDATE reserve_info SET RESERVE_STATE=? WHERE GROUP_KEY=? AND LOGIN_ID=?
queryMap.delete_sql: delete from reserve_info WHERE GROUP_KEY=? AND LOGIN_ID=?
queryMap.delete_tel_sql: delete from reserve_info WHERE GROUP_KEY=? and REPLACE(USER_TEL1 ,'-','')=REPLACE(?,'-','') AND LOGIN_ID=?
queryMap.insert_sql: INSERT INTO reserve_info (USER_NAME, USER_TEL1, USER_EMAIL, ACCONT_NO, RESERVE_DATE, ROOM_NUM, MEMO, CAR_NUM, LOGIN_ID, RESERVE_STATE, GROUP_KEY, CAR_ADD_CNT, PEOPLE_ADD_CNT, TOTAL_PAY, PRICE_DESC, CREATION_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, now() );
